description: display a list of bookmarks - when pressing enter open the one with the typed name if it exists
search for $query on duckguckgo.com in a new tab
search for $query on google.com in a new tab
search for $query on youtube.com in a new tab
view $article on wikipedia within this page
show a note-taking widget, and optionally perform a function (add, delete or edit) on note with the inputed name
display a gif of $object (e.g. a cat) from tenor within this page
